text: niccayamaka allah kocuvaiyo, atilum (arpattil) merpattataiyo utaranam kuruvatil vetkappatamattan. (Irai) nampikkaik kontavarkal niccayamaka a(vvutaranamana)tu tankal iraivanitamiruntu vantulla unmaiyenpatai arivarkal; anal (irai nampikkaiyarra) kahpirkalo, "ivvita utaranattin mulam iraivan enna natukiran?" Enru (elanamakak) kurukirarkal. Avan itaikkontu palarai valikettil vitukiran; innum palarai itan mulam nalvalip patuttukiran; anal tiyavarkalait tavira (veru yaraiyum) avan atanal valikettil akkuvatillai
